actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 with respect to the apportionment of funds to States available under that act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act to $500,000,000 for each fiscal year through 1989. Prescribes a new formula for the apportionment of funds under such Act among the various States. Calls for the annual review of State programs to implement statewide outdoor recreation plans. Provides that not less than 25 percent of the amount allocated to a State for the development of recreation facilities be approved for the development of indoor recreation facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 with respect to the apportionment of funds to States available under that act, and for other purposes.
